examples.full_description: GithubRepo initialization with hash sets key 'name' to @name
GithubRepo initialization with hash sets key 'html_url' to @url
GithubService initialization can be initialized without an `access_hash`
GithubService initialization can be initialized with an `access_hash`
GithubService #authenticate! sends the correct POST request

exception.message:
Real HTTP connections are disabled. Unregistered request: POST https://github.com/login/oauth/access_token with body 'client_id=&client_secret=&code=20' with headers {'Accept'=>'application/json', 'Accept-Encoding'=>'gzip;q=1.0,deflate;q=0.6,identity;q=0.3', 'Content-Type'=>'application/x-www-form-urlencoded', 'User-Agent'=>'Faraday v0.9.1'}

You can stub this request with the following snippet:

stub_request(:post, "https://github.com/login/oauth/access_token").
  with(:body => {"client_id"=>"", "client_secret"=>"", "code"=>"20"},
       :headers => {'Accept'=>'application/json', 'Accept-Encoding'=>'gzip;q=1.0,deflate;q=0.6,identity;q=0.3', 'Content-Type'=>'application/x-www-form-urlencoded', 'User-Agent'=>'Faraday v0.9.1'}).
  to_return(:status => 200, :body => "", :headers => {})

registered request stubs:

stub_request(:post, "https://api.github.com/user/repos").
  with(:body => {"{\"name\":\"a-new-repo\"}"=>true},
       :headers => {'Authorization'=>'token 1'})
stub_request(:get, "https://api.github.com/user").
  with(:headers => {'Authorization'=>'token 1'})
stub_request(:post, "https://github.com/login/oauth/access_token").
  with(:body => {"client_id"=>nil, "client_secret"=>nil, "code"=>"20"},
       :headers => {'Accept'=>'application/json'})
stub_request(:get, "https://api.github.com/user/repos").
  with(:headers => {'Authorization'=>'token 1'})

============================================================
